title: Can I refund DJ Sona?
body: So I bought DJ Sona Lon time ago, and I don't use her often so I thought that I wasted money for her skin. If there is a refund, then I would be pleased to get her skin refunded. I really hate it if I waste 3250 good riot points for nothing.

replies.body: You can [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2)a skin if it was bought within 90 days, if it has been longer than than you are out of luck.

As *Lew* mentioned, the official refund policy is that you must have a refund token available, and it must have been a purchase within the last 90 days. You can find our entire Refunding content guide [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

If you have any questions, please let me know.
